Reviews.Title: terrible
Reviews.Author: bradley hays
Reviews.Content: horrible, blurry. Looks great but takes s***ty quality pictures.  I am about to start the return process. i love cannon

Reviews.Title: The camera is not in my yet

Reviews.Content: Good afternoon,Soon I will give answers because the camera come to my hands after September 30th.Thanks a lot
